verses.roman:
īśāne bolāñā punaḥ sthāna lepāila
punarapi gopālake anna samarpila

synonyms: īśāne—to Īśāna, the servant; bolāñā—calling; punaḥ—again; sthāna—the place; lepāila—cleaned; punarapi—again; gopālake—unto Gopāla; anna—cooked rice and vegetables; samarpila—offered.
translation: "Thus wondering, she called Īśāna, the servant, and had the place cleaned again. She then offered another plate to Gopāla.
